sig_info: After using cards to play a Dead Man’s Hand Debuff, instead of being removed, all slots are randomly assigned 1 matching suit.
Additionally, suits gain a stackable bonus during Special Attacks.
Clubs: +10 to 30% of a bar of Power over 2 seconds.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: An enhanced immune system provides full immunity to the Poisons of the Battlerealm.
GAMBLERS DRAW: Joe Fixit can hold 4 cards at a time. At max capacity, new cards replace old cards in the same order they were acquired.
Cards are drawn even if the attack was blocked.
Hearts: End a Combo with Light, +7% Life Steal.
Spades: End a Combo with Medium, +33.6 Attack Rating.
Clubs: Heavy Hit, +25% Combat Power Rate.
Diamonds: Well-Timed Block, +25% Block Penetration.
When Defending a Quest Node, cards are acquired based on the Attacking Champions actions.
Duckslug Editorial
Hearts and Spades are drawn from last attack in combo, not first.
Cards can be drawn when attacking into a block.
DEAD MAN\u2019S HAND - ON SPECIAL ACTIVA: If Joe's hand consists of one of the following combinations, inflict the respective Debuff for 10 seconds. +5 seconds per bar of Power spent.
One Pair: Disorient, reducing Defensive Ability Accuracy and Block Proficiency by 40%.
Three of a Kind: Weakness, reducing Attack Rating by 30%.
Flush: Petrify with a potency of 60%.
Playing a hand removes all cards on the last hit of the Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On Hit, 50% chance to Inflict a Bleed Debuff dealing 29.4 Direct Damage over 10 seconds. +1 per Dead Man’s Hand Debuff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Final hit has a 100% chance to inflict a 2.75 second Stun Debuff.
Replay the last Dead Man’s Hand Debuff that was played.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a random Dead Man’s Hand Debuff.
Until the Opponent is no longer suffering any Dead Man’s Hand Debuffs, Gamblers Draw card effects have +30% Potency.

Cards can be drawn when attacking into a block.
DEAD MAN\u2019S HAND - ON SPECIAL ACTIVA: If Joe's hand consists of one of the following combinations, inflict the respective Debuff for 10 seconds. +5 seconds per bar of Power spent.
One Pair: Disorient, reducing Defensive Ability Accuracy and Block Proficiency by 40%.
Three of a Kind: Weakness, reducing Attack Rating by 30%.
Flush: Petrify with a potency of 60%.
Playing a hand removes all cards on the last hit of the Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: On Hit, 50% chance to Inflict a Bleed Debuff dealing 608.3 Direct Damage over 10 seconds. +1 per Dead Man’s Hand Debuff.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Final hit has a 100% chance to inflict a 2.75 second Stun Debuff.
Replay the last Dead Man’s Hand Debuff that was played.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Inflict a random Dead Man’s Hand Debuff.
Until the Opponent is no longer suffering any Dead Man’s Hand Debuffs, Gamblers Draw card effects have +30% Potency.

sig_info: After using cards to play a Dead Man’s Hand Debuff, instead of being removed, all slots are randomly assigned 1 matching suit.
Additionally, suits gain a stackable bonus during Special Attacks.
Clubs: +10 to 30.04% of a bar of Power over 2 seconds.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: An enhanced immune system provides full immunity to the Poisons of the Battlerealm.
GAMBLERS DRAW: Joe Fixit can hold 4 cards at a time. At max capacity, new cards replace old cards in the same order they were acquired.
Cards are drawn even if the attack was blocked.
Hearts: End a Combo with Light, +7% Life Steal.
Spades: End a Combo with Medium, +938.4 Attack Rating.
Clubs: Heavy Hit, +25% Combat Power Rate.
Diamonds: Well-Timed Block, +25% Block Penetration.
When Defending a Quest Node, cards are acquired based on the Attacking Champions actions.
